sources.title: Jim Hanvey, Detective (1937)
sources.description: An insurance company hires Private Detective Jim Hanvey to recover a stolen emerald necklace.

sources.title: Jim Hanvey, Detective (1937)
sources.description: Hanvey is a detective who's hired by an insurance company to find a missing emerald. He finds it, when he tries to turn it in, serious complications arise.

sources.title: Jim Hanvey Detective (1937) MYSTERY
sources.description:
Stars: Guy Kibbee, Tom Brown, Lucie Kaye
 Director: Phil Rosen

 Jim Hanvey is a genial but top-notch detective who has retired to his country home. An insurance company hires him to find a missing emerald so they won't have to pay out the $100,000 for which the jewel is insured. It doesn't take him long to find the emerald, but he discovers that finding it was the easy part; the difficult part is getting it back to its rightful owner, and he winds up involved in a murder in which an innocent man is framed.

metadata.Plot: Jim Hanvey is a genial but top-notch detective who has retired to his country home. An insurance company hires him to find a missing emerald so they won't have to pay out the $100,000 for which the jewel is insured. It doesn't take him long to find the emerald, but he discovers that finding it was the easy part; the difficult part is getting it back to its rightful owner, and he winds up involved in a murder in which an innocent man is framed.
metadata.Writer: Octavus Roy Cohen, Olive Cooper, Joseph Krumgold
metadata.Actors: Guy Kibbee, Tom Brown, Lucie Kaye
